CustomField.formula: TEXT( HOUR(Opening_Hour__c) ) & ":" & IF(TEXT( MINUTE(Opening_Hour__c)) = "0", TEXT(MINUTE(Opening_Hour__c)) & "0" , TEXT( MINUTE(Opening_Hour__c))) & " - " & TEXT( HOUR(Closing_Hour__c) ) & ":" & IF(TEXT( MINUTE(Closing_Hour__c)) = "0", TEXT(MINUTE(Closing_Hour__c)) & "0" , TEXT( MINUTE(Closing_Hour__c)))
CustomField.label: Working Hours
